title: Accessing the Employee Portal
content: The employee portal is the hub for HR, payroll, and updates. Go to staff.hello-telecom.com and log in using your staff ID. If you forget your password, use the Forgot Password link or contact IT Helpdesk.

title: Mandatory Training
content: All new employees must complete the online induction module within 7 days. Training covers customer service standards, data privacy, compliance, and company policies.

title: Greeting Standards
content: Always greet customers politely. Standard greeting: “Welcome to Hello Telecom, how may I help you?” Use a friendly tone and a smile for face-to-face interactions.

title: Customer Verification
content: To protect customer accounts, always verify full legal name and last 4 digits of ID or passport. Never process sensitive requests without verification.

title: Escalation Process
content: If issues cannot be solved at first contact: Level 1: basic troubleshooting. Level 2: forward to technical team. Level 3: supervisor approval. Document all actions before escalating.

title: Leave Requests
content: Submit leave requests via the HR portal at least 7 days in advance. For emergency leave, notify your supervisor immediately and log it later.

title: Sales Reporting
content: Enter daily sales in the CRM system by 8 PM. If the system is down, notify your supervisor and record the sales manually for later upload.

title: Incident Reporting
content: Log all technical issues in the IT Helpdesk system immediately. Provide screenshots or error codes to speed up resolution.

title: HR Department
content: Email hr@hello-telecom.com for leave, payroll, benefits, and policy inquiries.

title: IT Helpdesk
content: Email it@hello-telecom.com for login issues, portal downtime, or IT-related problems.

title: Supervisor Hotline
content: Dial *200 for urgent cases requiring supervisor approval, such as escalated disputes.
